column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Aang says : " A blockade . "
#Text=Zuko says : " Why 'd you do it ? "
#Text=Azula says : " You 're going to have to be a little more specific . "
#Text=Zuko says : " Why did you tell Father that I was the one who killed the Avatar ? "
#Text=Azula says : " Ca n't this wait until the morning ? "
#Text=Zuko says : " It .
#Text=You seemed so worried about how Father would treat you because you had n't captured the Avatar .
#Text=I figured if I gave you the credit , you 'd have nothing to worry about .
#Text=" Zuko says : " But why ?
#Text=" Azula says : " Call it a generous gesture .
#Text=I wanted to thank you for your help and I was happy to share the glory .
#Text=" Zuko says : " You 're lying .
#Text=" Azula says : " If you say so ... " Zuko says : " You have another motive for doing this , I just have n't figured out what it is .
#Text=" Azula says : " Please Zuko , what ulterior motive could I have ?
#Text=What could I possibly gain by letting you get all the glory for defeating the Avatar ?
#Text=Unless , somehow , the Avatar was actually alive .
#Text=All that glory would suddenly turn to shame and foolishness .
#Text=But you said it yourself , that was impossible .
#Text=Sleep well , Zuzu .
#Text=" Aang says : " I 'm not gon na make it .
#Text=I failed .
#Text=Roku ?
#Text=" Roku says : " You have n't failed , Aang .
#Text=" Aang says : " But everyone thinks I 'm dead again .
#Text=They think I 've abandoned them , and I 'm losing this war .
#Text=I 'm letting the whole world down .
#Text=" Roku says : " If anyone is to blame for the state of the world , it is me .
#Text=I should have seen this war coming and prevented it .
#Text=You inherited my problems and my mistakes .
#Text=But I believe you are destined to redeem me and save the world .
#Text=" Aang says : " I do n't know .
#Text=" Yue says : " You already saved the world .
#Text=And you 'll save the world again , but you ca n't give up .
#Text=" Aang says : " You 're right .
#Text=I wo n't give up .
#Text=" Katara says : " You 're okay !
#Text=" Aang says : " I have so much to do .
#Text=" Katara says : " I know , but you 'll have our help .
#Text=" Toph says : " You did n't think you could get out of training just by coming to the Fire Nation , did you ?
#Text=" Aang says : " What about the invasion ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " We 'll join up with my dad and the invasion force the day of the eclipse .
#Text=" Toph says : " Hey !
#Text=What 's ... oh , it 's your glider .
#Text=" Aang says : " It 's okay .
#Text=If someone saw it , it would give away my identity .
#Text=It 's better for now that no one knows I 'm alive .
#Text="
